install.name: JoomLeague Adminpanel Icon Module
install.author: JoomLeague Developers
install.description:
JoomLeague Adminpanel Icon Module

This is a handy module to display a JoomLeague icon on your administrator back-end's Control Panel page. Clicking it brings you to the JoomLeague backend administration page.

Important! You have to manually enable this module. Go to Extensions, Module Manager and click the Administrator link (not the Site link). Set the position to "icon", enable this module and you're set!
